name: Obvious Engineering
overview:
Obvious Engineering are a Computer Vision IP and product development company, working to connect digital content to the physical world.

We are working to power digital content that is responsive to physical objects and space, adding education and entertainment to products, solving discovery and trial problems within online and offline retail, and powering new types of Digital/Physical products.

Our first product is the Obvious Engine, a vision-based augmented reality engine for product makers, retailers, developers, games companies and brands to link digital content and expereinces to their physical products, packaging and media.
